column4: Question about /home and alike during install.  Should I create different partitions for them during install or not (for the purposes of backups in case of needing to reinstall the OS)?
If I do reinstall the OS, will it destroy all data in the partition that the OS is installing to?
During install (since I never separated /home), do I tell the installer about /home or would that just cause it to reformat the /home partition?
if you don't have a separate /home partition and you repartition your drive, you'll erase /home along with everything else
